description: 27 detectable errors - audited by Gemini Pro + 3x Flash consensus

issues.description: P&L and OCI titles say '2022' but columns show 2023/2022
P&L missing 'CONSOLIDATED' label (BS and CF have it)
2023: Positive 285,986 labeled 'Net current liabilities'. 2022: (45,237) bracketed inconsistently
Note 10 titled 'PPE' but contains ROU asset data (195,876 ties to BS ROU, not PPE 383,802)
BS references Note 12 for PPE but note is numbered Note 10
Note 10 NBV rollforward sums to 95,876 but closing table shows 195,876 (100k difference)
Note 10 narrative: depreciation 23,469 + 26,998 = 50,467, but table shows 150,467
CF bank loans 28,987 vs Note 31(b) 30,446
CF Financing 2022: stated -1,020,365 but sums to -1,167,973 (cascades to net increase error)
CF long-term notes 498,196 vs Note 31(b) 496,737
Note 4 cost of inventories 11,322,355 vs P&L cost of sales 10,221,721
Note 4 references 'Note 1' for depreciation but PPE is Note 10/12
Amortization: Note 4=62,534 vs P&L=26,534 vs Note 31(a)=12,738
Note 4 reorg 2023=46,825 vs P&L=nil
Note 4 impairment 14,135 vs Note 21 net movement 14,024
P&L non-core 52,695 vs Note 4 sum 53,316 (reorg 46,825 + other 6,491)
Aging table shows impossible negative (108,351) in 91-180 days bucket
Two aging tables show different totals: 1,017,189 vs 1,023,971
Provision rollforward: 51,280+15,023-53,725-999+160=11,739 vs stated 11,850
References 'Note 3' for impairment but breakdown is in Note 4
Note 31(a) 2022: Interest=46,250 and Depreciation=70,478 are swapped vs P&L
Note 31(a) operating profit before WC 2023: stated 417,535 vs calculated 517,535
OCI 2022 reclassification subtotal: 44,703+4,405=49,108 vs stated 48,478
P&L non-cash interest 22,942 vs Note 31(b) sum 14,897 (lease 15,645 - notes 748)
